creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center in honor of Marilyn Tupper Doe
description: triangular rock at center with two pines and portion of building visible at top; small island with pine at LR behind lone figure in boat; mountain peak at horizon with two sailing boats UL
marks: Signature and Seals LLQ: [ 九霞山樵写 ]
title: Kinzan Island
